description: Vegans rejoice! We have the perfect vegan dessert recipe for you. Whip up these chocolate cashew bites for a delish no-bake snack or on-the-go treat.
keywords: Vegan Choc-Cashew Bites With Cacao Nibs
name: Vegan Choc-Cashew Bites With Cacao Nibs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place milk chocolate in a snaplock bag and snip off 1 corner. Drizzle balls with chocolate. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until balls are firm and chocolate has set. Serve.
